gameDetails.name: Materia Prima: The Cult Expansion
gameDetails.description:
From the vaults and drainage shafts one can hear the unholy muttering of ancient ceremonies. The followers of this cult worship a god who is known in the vernacular only as the Unspeakable. His arrival is near.

Dive deeper into the world of Alka Sowa. The expansion "the Cult" contains a mini-campaign, which consists of two full-length scenarios and offers some new gameplay mechanics.

To play the expansion you need both Materia Prima - The Alchemists Guild and Materia Prima - The Inquisition.

—description from the publisher
